page.title: 14Binstead Community Centre
page.content: Binstead is a rapidly expanding village because of continuing housing developments. In 1978 the building of a{community centre}began and it took six months to complete. The cost of Â£54,000 was met by local grants and fund raising activities. The centre is in use from 9am to 5pm for{playgroup, mother and baby, keep {fit, over 60's and yoga.}From 6pm it is used for{brownies, guides, football {club, badminton, table tennis and {aerobics. At weekends the centre is used for {children's birthday parties, badminton {, weddings, cabaret evenings and {dances. All age groups enjoy the use of the centre fom 4 to 84 years old. The committee members are unpaid but there are two paid cleaners.
